name: GB-Wordyl: Wordle clone for Game Boy (& Color) / Analogue Pocket
name_original: GB-Wordyl: Wordle clone for Game Boy (& Color) / Analogue Pocket
description:
GB-Wordyl

A Wordle clone for the Nintendo Game Boy / Color and Analogue Pocket

  • Original source and version by stacksmashing (twitter)  (playable on itch.io)
  • Dictionary improvements by zeta_two
  • Game Boy Color support + GFX refactor and improvement by bbbbbr
  • Also check out another Game Boy Wordle clone by 32mbit: Word-o

You can download the ROM file, run the Gameboy emulator in your browser on this.

  • To run the browser version: Click to start and click again to set focus

Keyboard:

  • Start = Enter key
  • L/R/D = Arrow keys 
  • Rotate: = Z,  X

USB/Bluetooth/etc Gamepad:

(This is a modified JS Game Boy emulator with gamepad support)

  • Chrome / Firefox Mapping ( when "standard" gamepad available):
  • Rotate = A, B
  • Show Pet Length = Select button (Up button in Game Gear version)
  • L/R/D = Use D-Pad
  • Start = Start button
  • Default mapping otherwise :
  • Rotate = First two buttons  
  • Start and Select = Second two buttons
  • Source - https://github.com/bbbbbr/gb-wordle
  • Built with GBDK 2020 - https://github.com/gbdk-2020/gbdk-2020/
